input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to set up your phone on tumblr?
input_text.Response A: I am not sure if I can help you with that. I am not familiar with tumblr or how to set up a phone on it. I am just a large language model trained to have polite, helpful, conversations with people.
input_text.Response B:
Greetings, my esteemed inquirer! I would be more than delighted to assist you in the intricate and multifaceted process of setting up your celestial device, commonly referred to as a "phone," on the mystical and alluring platform of Tumblr.

To begin our journey into the realm of Tumblrific wonders, you shall first need to download and install the Tumblr application onto your phone. This can be accomplished by accessing the appropriate app store for your device (e.g., the Apple App Store for iOS devices or the Google Play Store for Android devices) and searching for "Tumblr." Once you have located the application, you can proceed with the installation process, which may involve providing your Tumblr account credentials or creating a new account if you do not already have one.

Once the application is installed, you can launch it and embark on the enchanting journey of configuring your account settings. This may involve selecting your preferred language, choosing your desired theme, and customizing your dashboard to suit your unique aesthetic preferences.

Next, you shall need to connect your Tumblr account to your phone's contact list, so that you can effortlessly share your posts and engage with other users on the platform. To accomplish this, you can navigate to the "Settings" menu within the Tumblr application and select "Contacts." From there, you can grant the application permission to access your contact list, and it shall magically synchronize with your Tumblr account.

Now, let us proceed to the wondrous realm of post creation! To compose a new post, you can tap the "+" icon located at the top-right corner of the screen, select the type of post you desire (e.g., a photo, a video, or a text-only post), and then follow the on-screen prompts to upload your content. You can also add captions, hashtags, and other embellishments to your post to make it more captivating and discoverable by other users.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
